meanings.definition: The quality of being determined or unwavering in purpose.
meanings.sent1: Her resoluteness in achieving her goals inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent2: His resoluteness in finishing the project on time earned him praise from his boss.
meanings.sent3: The resoluteness of the squirrel in getting to the bird feeder was both impressive and amusing.
meanings.sent4: The resoluteness of the mountain stood as a symbol of strength and determination.
meanings.sent5: The resoluteness of the waves crashing against the shore was a powerful sight.

meanings.definition: The act of making a firm decision or commitment.
meanings.sent1: After much thought, her resoluteness to pursue a career in medicine never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The team's resoluteness to win the championship was evident in their intense training sessions.
meanings.sent3: His resoluteness to only eat vegetables for a month led to some comical dinner conversations.
meanings.sent4: The resoluteness of the sun rising every morning is a reminder of the constancy of nature.
meanings.sent5: The resoluteness of the clock ticking away the seconds emphasized the passing of time.
